name: Verify a PATCH body containing valid authorization information and the correct (id) and correct
fullName: As an administrator, I want to be able to update the information: Verify a PATCH body containing valid authorization information and the correct (id) and correct
description:
of the blog with the specified id number via the API connection.
  data (title, category_id, description, content) is sent to the api/updateBlog/{id}
  endpoint, it must be verified that the returned status code is 200, the remark informationin
  the response body is "success" and the message information is "Successfully Updated."
descriptionHtml:
of the blog with the specified id number via the API connection.
data (title, category_id, description, content) is sent to the api/updateBlog/{id}
endpoint, it must be verified that the returned status code is 200, the remark informationin
the response body is "success" and the message information is "Successfully Updated."

steps.name: *  Rekare The api user sends a "PATCH" request and saves the returned response.
*  Rekare The api user verifies that the status code is 200.
*  Rekare The api user verifies that the "remark" information in the response body is "success".
*  Rekare The api user verifies that the "Message" information in the response body is "Successfully Updated.".
*  Rekare The api user verifies that the "Updated Blog Id" information in the response body is the same as the id path parameter in the endpoint.
